page.t: There are no or not enough satellites available, and the restocking of satellites is deactivated.\nWhen using both types of satellites, at least one of each type must be available.
There are no remaining structures left where we need to deploy a satellite.
I will start placing satellites in sector %2%1\033X.
Deploys satellites at Stations, Jumpgates, Accelerators, and/or Superhighways within a sector.
Deploys satellites at Stations, Jumpgates, Accelerators, and/or Superhighways throughout the entire galaxy.
